• {{u.id}} - {{u.username}}
import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { AccountService } from './_services/account.service'; import { User } from './_models/user'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit { users:any; constructor(private http:HttpClient,private _accountser:AccountService){} ngOnInit(): void { this.getAllUser(); this.SetCurrentUser(); } getAllUser(){ this.http.get('http://localhost:5019/api/users').subscribe({ next:response=>this.users=response, error:error=>console.log(error), complete:()=>console.log('request completed') }) } SetCurrentUser(){ const userString=localStorage.getItem("user") if(!userString) return; const user:User=JSON.parse(userString) this._accountser.setCurrentUser(user); } }
